import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Container, Col, Row, Button, Form, InputGroup, Badge, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { ArrowReturnLeft } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import '../style/Order.css'; import { order } from "../data/order"; import { product } from '../data/product'; const OrderDetail = () => { const { orderid } = useParams(); const userOrder = order.filter(item => (item.id === orderid))[0]; return (

) } const ProductList = ({ products }) => { return (

Product
Unit Price
Quantity
Sub-Total
{ products.map((item, key) => ( {item.code} {item.title}
{item.sku.itemName}
Unit Price {item.sku.discount > 0 ? {`$${item.sku.price}`} : `$${item.sku.price}`}
{item.sku.discount > 0 ? `$${item.sku.price * (100 - item.sku.discount) / 100}` :
} Quantity
{item.amount}
 Amount ${item.sku.price * (100 - item.sku.discount) / 100 * item.amount} )) } Total (HKD) $ { products.reduce((prevVal, currValue) => ( prevVal + currValue.amount * (currValue.sku.price * (100 - currValue.sku.discount) / 100) ), 0) } ) } export default OrderDetail;
